about_the_game:
This is the skin DLC for《回家 - Homeward》
Let characters to change into new outfits, Cute All-match Karakusa Cloth is the Good Partner in a adventure journey！

Green Karakusa Cloth skin bundles
1.Leopard Cat：Green Karakusa Cloth skin
2.Formosan Black Bear：Green Karakusa Cloth skin
3.Formosan Rock-monkey：Green Karakusa Cloth skin
4.Formosan Clouded Leopard：Green Karakusa Cloth skin

After purchasing, please go to the in-game store page to choose "Put on"
